type: Local Area Network Solution for the Place du Portage complex
short_summary: Supplier to provide Solution for the Place du Portage complex
description: The following amendment No.005 was raised to:Modify the Question and Answers documentModify Annexes B & CExtend the closing date to February10th 2023 at 09:00 AM EDST.The following amendment No.004 was raised to:Modify the Question and Answers documentThe following amendment No.003 was raised to:Modify the Question and Answers documentThe following amendment No.002 was raised to:Modify annex CThe following amendment No.001 was raised to:Extend the closing date to February 3rd 2023 at 15:00 EDST.Modify annexes B & CAdd the Questions and Answers documentThis solicitation is being issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for the supply and delivery of Local Area Network Solution for the Place du Portage complex. It is intended to result in the award of a single contract and will be used by SSC to provide shared services to one or more of its clients.Bids must be submitted only to the SSC Email Address for RFQ Submission by the date, time and place indicated on page 1 of the RFP.Canada reserves the right to cancel the procurement process at any time.\
